title: Attachment Quiz 2

questions.text: When we disagree, what's my typical pattern?
choices: I need to resolve it quickly
I want to talk it through immediately
I need time to process alone

questions.text: How easy is it for me to trust you completely?
choices: It takes time but I get there
I struggle but I'm working on it
Trust comes and goes for me

questions.text: What do I need when I feel insecure?
How do I handle it when you're stressed or distant?
choices: Try to help or fix things

questions.text: What would I struggle with most if we broke up?

description: Discover your comfort patterns and need for closeness.
